alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 12:13AM CDT until June 20 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern St. Charles Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1213 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Norco, or near Hahnville, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hahnville, Laplace, Norco, Montz, Taft, New Sarpy, Destrehan, St. Rose, Ama and Killona. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 210 and 221. Interstate 55 in Louisiana near mile marker 1. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist
